DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Intermittent Fasting study investigate whether intermittent fasting could decrease chronic inflammation level overweight/obese people .
DOC.brief_title: Can Intermittent Fasting Mimic Metabolic Cardiovascular Anti-aging Effects Calorie Restriction ?
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine whether IF reduces level chronic inflammation evidence decrease high sensitive C-reactive protein ( hsCRP ) , main outcome measure
DOC.criteria: The participant study 50 men woman 30 65 year age range , BMI high normal moderately obese range ( i.e . 24 35 kg/m2 ) , Participants eat usual US diet sedentary moderately active ( i.e . exercise train ) . History chronic disease process could interfere interpretation result Smoking , pregnancy , alcoholism , psychiatric problem , life situation would interfere study participation compliance .
